auth.title: Authorization
auth.paragraph_1: Enter your phone number to login or register
auth.paragraph_2: Your phone will receive a call. Enter the last 4 digits of the number.

not_found.title: We still working on it!
not_found.paragraph_1: The mobile version of the site is currently unavailable. We're working on it.
not_found.paragraph_2: You can go to the old version of the site by clicking the button below

profile.title: Our man!
profile.description: Thank you for becoming one with us. We are now one team!

contacts.title: We left our phone number!
contacts.description: We are leaving you our contacts, with the hope that you will leave yours on the checkout page!

favs.title: Favorite products, for your favorite customer.
favs.description: We remember what you love. With love, TM SHE brand.

about.title: Thank you!
about.description: You are exploring us and we are grateful for that. I hope you like us, because we like you.
